entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
